WHAT_HAPPENS_DESCRIPTION:
Your data will be saved in a database. When your personal QR code is scanned, your data will be added to this event for 2 weeks for contact tracing.
You will not receive any advertising and your data will be handled with caution.
Thank you for your trust.
In order to check you in the event, we n: We must verify that you have a valid mobile phone number before granting you access to the facility.
Take a screenshot of this code, so if yo: You can take a screenshot  of this code to re-use next time.
